articles.author: ERICA HUNZINGER
articles.title: Water worries in West force sports teams to get creative
articles.description: DENVER (AP) — The Arizona Diamondbacks ripped out the grass at Chase Field ahead of the 2019 season, replacing it with synthetic grass. It was a business decision, but it also ended up being a water-conservation measure.
